title: bug splat
body: How do i fix this bug splat on ubuntu 16.04 where i can go to game and play but when i press shop i get bug splat?

replies.body:
The shop is actually one of the hardest parts of the client to get working in Linux. I haven't seen many cases where it's actually worked reliably on any method of playing League on Linux. Unfortunately, we don't have official support for Linux, so you'll want to reach out to the amazing communities on the [**Wine Forums**](https://forum.winehq.org/) or the [**PlayOnLinux Forms**](https://www.playonlinux.com/en/forums.html), depending on which method you're using to play the game.

Let me know if you have any other questions. Best of luck, Linux friend!
